item.description: It looks like we'll have most of the evidence from the 1st investigation at Central Wave together by then, and I'll be showing some of it off with my poor old decrepit laptop. Also, it's important for people hoping to be included in future investigations to participate in these "social" things (they end up being less social and more organizational anyhow), so do try to make it. A head's up here: the parking in downtown Portsmouth is abysmal, so try to get there a little early! You can wait in the bar upstairs... I go through there anyhow to get the owner to open the downstairs for us anyhow.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the guy who looks like my picture. Also, we usually get the restaurant area (downstairs) to ourselves.
item.name: The Seacoast Paranormal Research Group May Meeting
